<MembersIndex>

  name={<><a href="#aa45126829059172e7a55b24547167673">getSccEnterBlocks</a> (int SccNum, SmallVectorImpl&lt; BasicBlock &#42; &gt; &amp;Enters) const</>}>
Fills in <code>Enters</code> vector with all such blocks that don&#39;t belong to SCC with <code>SccNum</code> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> but there is an edge to a block belonging to the SCC. <a href="#aa45126829059172e7a55b24547167673">More...</a>

Fills in <code>Exits</code> vector with all such blocks that don&#39;t belong to SCC with <code>SccNum</code> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> but there is an edge from a block belonging to the SCC. <a href="#adf3e2e7e5049244c18140cf77a7baf2c">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="int"
  name={<><a href="#af2b37a5830be4881f3995e017ecd8473">getSCCNum</a> (const BasicBlock &#42;BB) const</>}>
If <code>BB</code> belongs to some SCC then <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of that SCC is returned, otherwise -1 is returned. <a href="#af2b37a5830be4881f3995e017ecd8473">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="bool"
  name={<><a href="#ad2fe989982caf7a59655a6b04386ea95">isSCCExitingBlock</a> (const BasicBlock &#42;BB, int SccNum) const</>}>
Returns true if <code>BB</code> is an &#39;exiting&#39; block in SCC with <code>SccNum</code> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, false otherwise. <a href="#ad2fe989982caf7a59655a6b04386ea95">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="bool"
  name={<><a href="#a2e8c63ab0125e479a7145ce999a1f7a5">isSCCHeader</a> (const BasicBlock &#42;BB, int SccNum) const</>}>
Returns true if <code>BB</code> is a &#39;header&#39; block in SCC with <code>SccNum</code> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, false otherwise. <a href="#a2e8c63ab0125e479a7145ce999a1f7a5">More...</a>

### getSCCNum() {#af2b37a5830be4881f3995e017ecd8473}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int BranchProbabilityInfo::SccInfo::getSCCNum (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB) const</>}>
If <code>BB</code> belongs to some SCC then <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of that SCC is returned, otherwise -1 is returned.

If <code>BB</code> belongs to more than one SCC at the same time result is undefined.

## Private Member Functions

### calculateSccBlockType() {#ac152495d17e40959d686bd3f6578b1a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void BranchProbabilityInfo::SccInfo::calculateSccBlockType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, int SccNum)</>}>
Calculates <code>BB&#39;s</code> type and stores it in internal data structures for future use.

Please note that <code>BB</code> must belong to SSC with <code>SccNum</code> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

### getSccBlockType() {#a99258ab64754799f0f5cd8c620d0b8c1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t BranchProbabilityInfo::SccInfo::getSccBlockType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, int SccNum) const</>}>
Returns <code>BB&#39;s</code> type according to classification given by SccBlockType enum.

Please note that <code>BB</code> must belong to SSC with <code>SccNum</code> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.
